title: 💖🏡 Home Sweet Home 💖🏡
posting_body: Head-turning Style, Extraordinary Location, The Arts at South Austin has it all!
We have a glorious Signature 1 Bed 1.5 Bath Townhome ready for move-in September 30th !
Today the pricing for a lease start date of 09/30/22 and a lease term of 13 months the price is $1615
*Pricing and availability change daily and are dependent on lease term and lease start date.
Call for the most up to date prices.
*Designer Kitchen and Bath with Old Bronze Hardware and Faucets
In our Community, you will find:
*Resort-style Pool with Plenty of Lounge Chairs and Tables as well as a BBQ section
*BBQ Grills and Picnic Tables throughout the community
*Amazing Dog Park Perfect for you Furry Friends!
Our perfect south central location keeps resident close to everything Austin has to offer.
We’re just 10 minutes from downtown and only 5 minutes to the trendy SoCo District.
Grab a bite at P. Terry's or Torchy's Tacos, or catch a show at one the many nearby live music venues.
Shorten your work commute with easy access to I35, MoPac, and Hwy 71/Ben White, and keep your kitchen stocked with just a short drive to your neighborhood HEB, Wal-Mart, or Central Market.
We also have MULTIPLE public transportation stops just outside our gates.
The best shopping, dining, and entertainment in town is always just a short drive away.
ALL PICTURES SHOWN ARE FOR ILLUSTRATION PURPOSE ONLY.
MAY VARY DUE TO PRODUCT ENHANCEMENT.
Call today or just stop on by and ask about apartment #326!
Ask for Arianna and mention you found us on craigslist!
